title: Cant save my contact locally on my phone
content:
Hi, i wish to save my contact locally on my phone i have no interest or wish saving my contacts to the cloud/drive.

I have tried to disable google contact sync app , however when trying to add a new account i still get the option to save it on my email.
Which i dont want.

Please explain me how to fix that.

There is a way to change the default contact app to a different one, which i will do in the end of the day just for the sake of not saving my contacts to the cloud.
